# PDF2JSON Project Instructions

This is a Python CLI application that converts PDF files to JSON format using PyMuPDF (fitz).

## Project Structure
- `src/pdf2xml/` - Main package
- `examples/` - Sample PDFs and outputs
- `tests/` - Unit tests

## Development
- Use Python 3.8+
- Use PyMuPDF (imported as `fitz`) for PDF processing
- Use `click` for CLI
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
